statements: SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT return_id, customer_id, return_reason, preference_date FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preference_date, return_reason FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, return_reason FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT customer_id, return_id, return_reason, preference_date FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, return_id FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 10 ORDER BY preference_date DESC;
SELECT return_reason FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_id IN (1, 2, 3) AND preference_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_reason LIKE '%damage%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(return_id) AS num_returns FROM customer_return_preferences GROUP BY customer_id HAVING num_returns >= 2 ORDER BY num_returns DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, return_preference FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT return_preference, customer_id FROM customer_return_preferences ORDER BY return_preference DESC;
SELECT customer_id FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_preference = 'refund';
SELECT process_id, process_description FROM return_processes ORDER BY process_id ASC;
SELECT customer_id, return_preference FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_preference = 'Refund';
SELECT * FROM return_processes WHERE process_description LIKE '%return%' ORDER BY process_id DESC;
SELECT process_id, process_description FROM return_processes WHERE process_id > 1000;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences JOIN return_processes ON customer_id = process_id;
SELECT customer_id, return_preference FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 500 AND return_preference = 'Exchange' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, preferred_return_method FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT system_name FROM logistics_systems WHERE system_type = 'Shipping';
SELECT system_name, system_type FROM logistics_systems ORDER BY system_name DESC;
SELECT process_id, return_status, return_datetime FROM return_processes WHERE customer_id = 200 ORDER BY return_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT preferred_return_method, return_options FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_options LIKE '%refund%';
SELECT process_id, return_status, return_datetime FROM return_processes WHERE customer_id = 456 ORDER BY return_datetime DESC;
SELECT system_name FROM logistics_systems WHERE system_type = 'delivery' ORDER BY system_name ASC;

SELECT customer_id, return_options, preferred_return_method FROM customer_return_preferences JOIN return_processes ON customer_return_preferences.customer_id = return_processes.customer_id WHERE return_status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, return_option, preference_score FROM customer_return_preferences ORDER BY preference_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_requests WHERE return_status = 'pending';
SELECT request_id, return_date FROM return_requests WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT log_id, request_id, return_timestamp FROM return_log ORDER BY return_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences;
SELECT customer_id, return_option, return_reason FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE preference_score > 5;
SELECT request_id, customer_id, return_date, return_status FROM return_requests ORDER BY return_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM return_log WHERE log_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT request_id, AVG(return_time_taken) AS avg_return_time FROM return_metrics GROUP BY request_id HAVING AVG(return_time_taken) > 10;
SELECT * FROM return_tracking;
SELECT return_id, tracking_code FROM return_tracking WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT rt.return_id, rt.status, ri.item_name FROM return_tracking rt JOIN return_items ri ON rt.return_id = ri.return_id;
SELECT rl.location_name, rl.address, rl.city, rl.state, rl.postal_code FROM return_locations rl WHERE rl.return_id = 101;
SELECT rr.receiver_name, rr.contact_email, rr.contact_phone FROM return_receivers rr ORDER BY receiver_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE customer_id = 123;
SELECT return_reason, return_resolution FROM customer_return_preferences WHERE return_type = 'refund';
SELECT tracking_code, status FROM return_tracking WHERE status = 'delivered';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM return_items WHERE return_id = 456 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state, postal_code FROM return_locations WHERE state = 'California';
